programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred uncovers the construction techniques of stonemasons and carpenters through the ages, focusing on Norman cathedrals. The former steeplejack admires Peterborough Cathedral and Rochester Castle, where he demonstrates how tactics used to invade the fortress centuries ago resemble todays demolition methods

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: The ex-steeplejack tours the coast of north Wales, visiting Harlech, Caernarfon and Beaumaris to admire the defensive features of the strongholds that helped Edward I subdue the Welsh. On the orders of the king, French architect Master James of St Georges revolutionised castle design in England

programme.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
programme.desc: Two notorious outlaws routine of bank and train robberies is cut short when a seemingly unstoppable posse is formed to catch them. The pair plan to flee America and start a new life in Bolivia, with the Sundance Kids schoolmistress lover in tow - but staying ahead of the law is not so easy. Western, starring Paul Newman, Robert Redford and Katharine Ross

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: An insight into the life of the Hollywood actor, who is one of the screens greatest heart-throbs, featuring rarely seen interviews that reveal he was much more than just a pin-up. Narrated by Sylvia Syms

programme.title: All the Presidents Men
programme.desc: The true story of Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein, who persevered in their investigation of the links between the Watergate break-in and the White House, a scandal that eventually forced the resignation of President Nixon. Alan J Pakulas drama, starring Robert Redford, Dustin Hoffman, Jason Robards and Hal Holbrook

programme.title: Rachels Farm
programme.desc: Film director and actress Rachel Ward joins a farming revolution. She voyages from willful ignorance about the ecological impacts of conventional agriculture on her own rural property, to embracing a movement to restore the health of Australias farmland, food and climate

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 7 July 1998. Featuring Pras Michel feat ODB and Mya, Ultra Nate, Peter Andre, Another Level, Billie Myers, Ace of Base and Jamiroquai

programme.title: Top of the Pops

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Gary Davies and Simon Mayo host the edition first aired on October 9. Performers include the Bangles, Nick Berry, Julian Cope, Paul Young, Howard Jones, Madonna and Paul Simon

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Simon Mayo hosts the edition first aired on October 4, with performances by artists including Twenty 4 Seven featuring Captain Hollywood, Pet Shop Boys, MC Tunes versus 808 State, Hi Tek 3 featuring Ya Kid K, MC Hammer, Technotronic, Bobby Vinton and Maria McKee

programme.title: An Evening with Glen Campbell
programme.desc: An archive concert by country music singer Glen Campbell in which he is accompanied by 80 musicians who played original arrangements of his greatest songs. Performed at Londons Royal Festival Hall in 1977

programme.title: Tammy
programme.desc: Nashville star Tammy Wynette and her band the Tennessee Gentlemen entertain an audience of country music fans at the Maltings in Suffolk, wth guests the Frank Jennings Syndicate. First broadcast in 1977

programme.title: Crystal Gayle: Sing Country Special 1978
programme.desc: The American country music singer performs some of the song which made her famous on both sides of the Atlantic, from Snape Maltings, Suffolk. With musical accompaniment by Peace and Quiet. First broadcast in August 1978

programme.title: Country Music by Ken Burns
programme.desc: The history of the American art form and how it evolved across the 20th century. The first programme explores the genres earliest years up to 1933, when so-called hillbilly music grew in popularity. After centuries of percolating in the American South, hillbilly began reaching more people through the new technologies of phonographs and radio. The Carter Family, with their ballads and old hymns, and Jimmie Rodgers, with his combination of blues and yodeling, became its first big stars. Contributors include Dolly Parton, Rosanne Cash and Merle Haggard. Narrated by Peter Coyote

programme.title: Country Music by Ken Burns
programme.desc: The history of the American art form focuses on the years 1933 to 1945, when the country music industry evolved with Nashville as its heart. The genre grew in popularity during the Great Depression and the Second World War, when America fell in love with singing cowboys, Texas Swing and the Grand Ole Oprys Roy Acuff. Contributors include Emmylou Harris, Vince Gill, Marty Stuart, Ray Benson, Merle Haggard, Willie Nelson and Ricky Skaggs. Narrated by Peter Coyote

programme.title: Glen Campbell: The Rhinestone Cowboy
programme.desc: An insight into the life of country music star Glen Campbell, documenting his remarkable journey from an impoverished childhood to worldwide fame and success as a guitarist and singer with records including Wichita Lineman and Rhinestone Cowboy. Featuring contributions by family, friends and colleagues including Jimmy Webb, Micky Dolenz and Bob Harris

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A first-time developer transforms a terrace property in Stoke-on-Trent, while more seasoned developers tackle projects in Leeds and Rugby in Warwickshire. Presented by Martin Roberts, Dion Dublin and Martel Maxwell

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion is at the Carmarthen Antiques and Flea Market in west Wales, and explores the rediscovered Rococo Gardens at Painswick. With Philip Serrell and Charles Hanson

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: A cars been stolen by suspected drug dealers - but a team of trackers, led by former police officer Neil, are pursuing it through the streets of Croydon

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr are on the home stretch as they renovate the kitchen by repurposing the old chestnut beds from Amandas bedroom to form its units. Keen to source local Carrara marble for the worktops, the duo visit an active quarry in the Apuan Alps - but face a treacherous journey to get there. Later, with the work completed, they reveal their restored 17th-century house to their Tuscan friends and host an emotional farewell party

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Having lived in the same house virtually all her life, a ukulele-playing buyer has £280,000 to relocate to south-west Wales. Briony May Williams is tasked with helping her to find the perfect property which also needs to accommodate an entourage of animals including a dog, two cats, three parrots, some chickens and thousands of bees

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Experts restore a rugby shirt worn by a professional Welsh player in the 1960s that has suffered a laundry catastrophe, a 45-year-old serving plate passed through generations , a map of Wharfedale used by an RSPCA inspector and an accordion from the 1940s

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Trevor Nelson

Joe Wicks returns as a guest dragon. Hosted by Evan Davis

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the game continues, the famous faithful realise the mission is not only high stakes, but could also hold important information in their hunt for the traitors. With the sun setting, the first round table commences, and emotions run high as the players suspicions are put to the test. Presented by Claudia Winkleman

Two homes are destined for the rental market, while the third becomes a labour of love for its new owner who plans to make it his home

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Peggy is delighted when Radio Catherine, her favourite pirate radio station, begins transmitting from Great Slaughter, one step ahead of the GPO engineer determined to bring them to justice. When their top DJ is murdered on-air, Sister Boniface is called in to investigate. Lorna Watson stars

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: In the stunning landscapes of north-west Wales, Sonali Shah meets a couple from Warwickshire who have a dream of owning a property that would provide them with a home and the ability to offer holiday lets. While in the region, Sonali meets a paddle-boarding campaigner helping to rid the area of plastic pollution

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: First into the workshop is Ben who brings with him his late sisters dress that once served as the muse for her art. Dominic Chinea and Rebecca Bissonnet attempt to restore the dress to its former glory so Ben can display it as part of a posthumous show. Richard brings in a damaged drum that was once the beating heart of an old Cornish May Day festival and Emma from Dudley is hoping the experts can repair her old clocking-in clock. Rob, Mark, Adam and Nick bring in a polo bike and mallet

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Lauren Laverne co-hosts the usual mix of celebrity guests and stories about people in extraordinary circumstances

programme.title: Live International Football
programme.desc: Northern Ireland v Slovakia (Kick-off 7.45pm). Stephen Watson presents all the action from the FIFA World Cup Group A qualifier, held at Windsor Park. Northern Ireland won their opening match in the group 3-1 in Luxembourg, before putting in a credible performance away to Germany but eventually losing by the same scoreline. The Slovaks have maximum points so far after claiming a fine 2-0 win at home to the Germans, before producing a considerably less inspiring performance in Luxembourg, but still prevailing thanks to a last-minute goal. This is the first meeting between the side since a UEFA Euro 2020 play-off here, which Slovakia won 2-1 after extra time, with Michal Duris scoring the winning goal

programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: Julia Roberts talks about her latest role in psychological campus drama After the Hunt. Colin Farrell discusses playing a con man and gambling addict in atmospheric thriller Ballad of a Small Player. Singer Gloria Estefan introduces her new Spanish-language album Raices. And Benedict Cumberbatch talks about playing a newly widowed father in The Thing with Feathers. Plus, Robbie Williams performs Pretty Face from the forthcoming album BRITPOP

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens take on a hyperpop banger for the Girl Group challenge. Girls Aloud star Nadine Coyle joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Professor Philip Goodman, famous for debunking hoaxes and ghost sightings, is given a dossier of three terrifying, unsolvable cases by his hero and role model Charles Cameron, who has been missing, presumed dead, for years. Can Goodman explain what even Cameron could not? Horror anthology, starring Andy Nyman, Martin Freeman and Paul Whitehouse

programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Christopher Columbus tries to teach a class the world is shaped like a pear, and Arctic explorer Peter Freuchen has to dig his way out of snow with a frozen poo

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Henry VIII enlists the help of Maître d Fred Sirieix as he tries to find the right wife on Historic First Dates, while Renaissance men try to impress the ladies

programme.title: EastEnders Investigates: The Manosphere
programme.desc: An investigation into the issues of misogyny and toxic masculinity, to coincide with the current EastEnders storyline centred on teenager Joel Marshall, played by Max Murray

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Mike approaches Alison to discuss their finances following the loss of their BandB business. However, his wife is preoccupied with plotting revenge on the ghosts for April Fools Day and recruits a playful Humphrey to execute her plans. Meanwhile, Mike is shocked to find someone from their insurance company on his doorstep - an unannounced visit to check the details of the gatehouse fire. Can Mike convince her that lightning really can strike thrice? Supernatural comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Simon Farnaby

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens take on a hyperpop banger for the Girl Group challenge. Girls Aloud star Nadine Coyle joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon as a British-Jamaican film-maker facing the day-to-day struggles of being an independent creative trying to survive in London. Kwabena searches for his first directing job, but only finds scripts built on tired black stereotypes. With time running out, he considers whether to take any job or hold out for integrity. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon, Dani Moseley and Demmy Ladipo

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas long-awaited break comes with Sin and Subterfuge, a radical colour-blind Regency drama. What at first feels like a dream project soon raises unsettling questions and Kwabena tries to find a solution. A spark with talented actress comes at the worst possible time when an old flame resurfaces. Meanwhile, Funmi and Maurice sharpen their airs and graces in a bid to secure Mayowa a place at the boroughs top nursery. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas first day on set finds him working with his hero, legendary actor Rudolph Williams. Determined to support the veteran performer, his good intentions are tested by the relentless demands of the shoot. To make matters worse, Vanessa weighs heavily on his mind, after their run-in brings up feelings he struggles to ignore. Maurice and Funmi are called in by the nursery after an altercation between Mayowa and another child, but are surprised to find things arent as they first assumed. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A woman quits her teaching job to be a governess for a young heiress who witnessed her parents tragic deaths, and ends up also teaching the girls problematic brother after he is sent home from boarding school. The tutor has some strange, unexplainable experiences in the house and begins to suspect there is more to their story than meets the eye. Modern adaptation of Henry Jamess gothic horror 1898 novella The Turn of the Screw, starring Mackenzie Davis, Finn Wolfhard, Brooklynn Prince and Joely Richardson

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy is hopeful that he could be fighting again soon, and he and Molly-Mae are spending more time together. Then, disaster strikes when KSI cancels the night when Roman was due to be in the fighting, claiming illness. John is furious, but decides the boys need cheering up so tells them he is taking them on a camping trip. However, neither Tommy nor Roman share their fathers love of the outdoors

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury

programme.desc: Crew members of a cargo spacecraft answer a distress call from a derelict alien vessel. However, their mission of mercy has fatal repercussions when a deadly, seemingly indestructible monster gets on board their ship and starts killing them one by one. Ridley Scotts sci-fi horror, starring Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, Ian Holm, John Hurt, Harry Dean Stanton, Yaphet Kotto and Veronica Cartwright

programme.title: Blackmailed: The Sextortion Killers
programme.desc: Reporter Tir Dhondy investigates the rise of sextortion scams targeting teenage boys on social media, including the case of 16-year-old victim Evan Boettler. Her journey leads to Nigeria, where she confronts the scammers taking part in these crimes. With unprecedented access and interviews with industry insiders, Tir exposes a disturbing online underworld and its devastating consequences

programme.desc: Larisa is fed up of hearing about her best mate Damis latest in a long line of dating fails. Larisa enlists the help of Gen Zs most trusted sex and relationships expert Oloni to put the 24-year-old Londoner on the spot and help him own up to his disastrous dating habits

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon as a British-Jamaican film-maker facing the day-to-day struggles of being an independent creative trying to survive in London. Kwabena searches for his first directing job, but only finds scripts built on tired black stereotypes. With time running out, he considers whether to take any job or hold out for integrity. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon, Dani Moseley and Demmy Ladipo

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas long-awaited break comes with Sin and Subterfuge, a radical colour-blind Regency drama. A spark with talented actress comes at the worst possible time when an old flame resurfaces. Meanwhile, Funmi and Maurice sharpen their airs and graces in a bid to secure Mayowa a place at the boroughs top nursery. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas first day on set finds him working with his hero, legendary actor Rudolph Williams. The Brooklyn-Bells try to coax him back, but he refuses to return. Doug decides to make a mini swimming pool by filling the ball pit with cool water. Waffle loves swimming pools. Chandler and Joey encourage Ross to enjoy bachelorhood when his lesbian wife walks out on him, while Phoebe supports herself playing guitar in the subway. Courteney Cox, Jennifer Aniston, David Schwimmer, Matthew Perry and Lisa Kudrow star

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Sonogram at the End

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica shows off her new boyfriend to the rest of the group, Chandler decides to take up smoking again and Phoebe makes a gruesome discovery that leads to her receiving a windfall. Starring Courteney Cox, Matthew Perry and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The girls end up breaking out binoculars in order to catch a glimpse of a good-looking neighbour with White House connections after accidentally receiving a pizza that he ordered, while Joey and Chandler take Ross to a ice hockey game to keep his mind busy

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler begins a relationship with a married woman, Ross tries to liven up his conservative image and Joey lands a film role with a difference - as a naked body-double for Al Pacino

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A power cut exposes Chandler to temptation by trapping him in a banks ATM lobby with only a stunning model for company. Ross has a hard time trying to ask Rachel out on a date, and Joey learns something interesting about Monica

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away

programme.desc: The gang celebrates New Years Eve with a party at Monica and Rachels flat, while Ross tries to alleviate his loneliness by getting a new room-mate - a monkey. Comedy, starring Courteney Cox and David Schwimmer

programme.desc: In this revisit episode, chef Gordon Ramsay goes back to Mojito, the Junction (formerly known as Flamangos) and Bazzini to check in with the owners he helped in the past and find out whether his advice has been put to good use. Will he be pleased with their progress?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer agrees to a request from Mel Gibson to help re-edit his latest film, a remake of the James Stewart classic Mr Smith Goes to Washington - and shocks the studio executives by adding a lot more action scenes

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart is placed on experimental medication in a bid to control his disruptive behaviour - but it proves to have unfortunate paranoia-inducing side-effects, which soon spiral out of control. Featuring the guest voice of baseball star Mark McGwire

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon re-evaluates the time he spends with Amy when she takes a job at the university. Meanwhile, Howard is forced to sleep on his friends sofa after he gets into an argument with Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Mayim Bialik

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon stumbles upon a major scientific breakthrough, causing him to feel like a fraud, while Penny steps up her game with Leonard after seeing Howard make a romantic gesture to Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The calamity-prone group visits a guest ranch where Mitch and Cam hope to rediscover their macho side, and a cowboy named Hank takes an instant shine to Gloria. Comedy, starring Ed ONeill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cam try to get Lily on their side when they decide to adopt a baby boy, but have doubts about whether they are adequately prepared to raise another child. Meanwhile, Gloria deals with Mannys head teacher

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys science skills are put to the test when they get a flat tyre during Leonards surprise bachelor party weekend in Mexico. Meanwhile, the girls finally force Penny to break the news to her family that she has eloped with Leonard. Keith Carradine guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard announce that they are moving in together, prompting Sheldon to revisit 2003, a much simpler time before he had met either of them. Howard and Raj form a band to play at the comic-book store, only to fall out over musical differences

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The boys want to become more sporty, so Barry Kripke leads them in a fencing lesson, while Penny, Amy and Bernadette help Stuart, who wants to attract more female customers to the comic-book store

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the middle of a nationwide shortage of liquid helium, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to obtain the supplies they need in order to prove a scientific theory before a rival team of researchers can beat them to it. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app onto Amys phone in order to find her a new boyfriend

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Boyle organises an elaborate scavenger hunt for Peraltas bachelor party, but the guys take some short cuts that throw the event into disarray. Santiagos bachelorette party goes awry when it comes to light that she once slept with a member of the band that is to play at her wedding reception

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad members worry about Diaz when she responds to an active shooter alert, but are instructed to stay back at the precinct building and are powerless to help. Peralta and Boyle try to find ways to assist Diaz, Jeffords has an existential crisis, while Santiago and Gina attempt to repair the broken toilet in the ladies room

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns asks the family to look after his mansion while he books himself into a clinic for a complete check-up - but with Homer in charge, things are hardly likely to run smoothly. Featuring the guest voice of Britney Spears

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Bart transform a losing racehorse into a champion - much to the dismay of rival jockeys, who soon start threatening dire reprisals. With the voices of Randy Bachman and Fred Turner

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a QandA session with the films director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time hed planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonards mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Conflict arises when Leonards newly divorced parents and Sheldons devoutly religious mother are all in town at the same time. And when Howard and Raj are contacted about the guidance system theyve developed, they assume that the government is out to get them. Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldons mother and Leonards father share an evening together. Pennys family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonards second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard has a meeting with Colonel Williams, a representative from the US air forces department of material command, about the gyroscope he invented with Leonard and Sheldon. Penny accidentally reveals that Bernadette is pregnant to their colleagues at work. Dean Norris guest stars

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge walks out on Homer for allowing an adult film to be shot in their house, and begins a new life - protecting endangered aquatic creatures alongside good-looking marine biologist Caleb Thorn. Featuring the guest voice of Alec Baldwin

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Girl Who Slept Too Little
programme.desc: A construction project causes the local graveyard to be moved next to the familys home - to the dismay of Lisa, who is so concerned by the development she begins to suffer nightmares. She eventually decides the best way to conquer her fear is by facing it head on and spending a night at the cemetery

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a doting father and decides to spend quality time with his youngest daughter when he discovers Santas Little Helper knows Maggie better than he does. Meanwhile, a lonely Moe joins an online dating agency, and gets a pleasant surprise when he meets an attractive woman

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In a crossover episode with Futurama, the Planet Express crew members travel back in time and turn up in Springfield on a mission to prevent the troublesome family from destroying the future. Its not just a question of asking nicely however - Bender has been programmed to kill Bart, Terminator-style. Can the clan foil the murderous bot?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Once again, maître d Fred Sirieix plays Cupid at the Manchester restaurant. First to arrive is 36-year-old, larger-than-life stand-up comedian Mani. Despite his confidence on stage, hes yet to find a strong, independent Pakistani Muslim woman he can settle down with off stage. His match is 30-year-old nursing home owner Natasha, whose quick wit and dry sense of humour seem set to give Mani a run for his money. Twenty nine-year-old hairdresser Scott has a history of relationships being cut short. Hes paired with gentle giant and self-confessed Nintendo geek Lewis, who wonders if his love of computer games is the thing thats keeping him single

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: A tenacious loner saves the life of a member of an ancient Japanese clan, and is inducted into their ranks where he learns the ways of a ninja warrior. However, when secrets from his past are revealed, his honour and allegiance will be tested - even if that means losing the trust of those closest to him. Action adventure, starring Henry Golding, Andrew Koji, Ursula Corbero and Samara Weaving

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson meets 34-year-old Skyla from Kent who runs her own cleaning business and is looking for Mr Right. Zeus, a 27-year-old trans man from Norwich, is new to the dating scene and is looking for someone special to go on this journey with him

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: After dating men, 26-year-old dog groomer Nico has realised shes barking up the wrong tree and actually prefers women. Shes hoping to find her the perfect partner able to get her all hot under the collar. Self-confessed bad girl Patrice has now seen the light and turned to God. All the 26-year-old care worker needs now is that special fella to take her to Heaven. Anna Richardson hosts the show in which potential dates bare all bit by bit in a bid to prove they are the ideal partner

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Race Across the World, Killing Eve, Graysons Art Club, CBeebies Bedtime Stories, This Morning and BBC News on Donald Trump and disinfectant. From 2020

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.sub-title: Let the Bottles Hit the Floor
programme.desc: The deck team struggle during a tender lesson, and bottles of liquor crash all over the boat on a severe sail. Danni gets emotional about a decor disagreement with Daisy

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Santas Little Helper is thrown out of the house for failing to save Homer from a fire - but goes on to earn a fortune as the new Duff Beer mascot, making him the subject of a bitter ownership battle

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil gets ready to play in a charity basketball match, but NBA stars Charles Barkley and DeAndre Jordan show up and the pressure gets too much for him

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: During a quick workout session in the garage, Mitchell accidentally knocks over an urn filled with the ashes of Cams beloved pet pig Lilly and quickly attempts to cover up his blunder. Hoping to catch Mitchell in a lie, Cam makes up a tall tale to trap him, but his own web of deceit soon becomes a little too big to manage

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cam have five minutes to catch a flight while fighting the effects of sleeping pills they took prematurely, while Haley and Rainer are forced to re-evaluate their entire relationship in the five minutes before a birthday cake arrives. Phil and Claire pay a surprise visit to Alex and are given a surprise introduction to her new boyfriend

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to Eagle Rock in California to try to change the fortunes of Capri, a grubby restaurant that often remains closed during lunchtime because of the twin owners lazy attitude. A crisis ensues as soon as Gordon instructs the duo to clean the place, revealing that only tough measures are likely to save the business

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries, encountering extraordinary wildlife and meeting remarkable people. To begin, Steve and a team of climbers and jungle survival experts head into the ancient landscape of South Americas Guiana Shield. This vast wilderness of pristine forests and towering table-top mountains is one of the most inaccessible terrains on the planet

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist leads an expedition into an unexplored desert canyon in the Jebel Akhdar mountain range of Oman. With temperatures soaring, dehydration and heat stroke are a constant threat

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve and a team of kayakers head to the Himalayas to attempt to row down the last great unexplored river in Bhutan. But theres a reason it has never been attempted before - it runs through a steep gorge which, according to legend, drops off the face of the planet

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve and his team venture into the heart of Suriname, to kayak an unnamed river that will take them through a forest unchanged for millions of years. The region is so remote, it could conceal undiscovered natural wonders - and so it proves as the journey results in a surprise beyond their wildest dreams

programme.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 29 August 1997. Featuring Jon Bon Jovi, Shola Ama, Conner Reeves, UB40, Tina Moore, Symposium, Chumbawamba and Will Smith

programme.desc: Zoe Ball and Jayne Middlemiss present the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 5 September 1997. Featuring Mariah Carey, Ocean Colour Scene, Ginuwine, All Saints, Hanson, Will Smith and George Michael

programme.desc: Mark Lamarr presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 12 September 1997. Featuring Hanson, Cast, Tina Moore, Finley Quaye, Kavana, N-Tyce, Mariah Carey and The Verve

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on the first leg of a journey from East Yorkshire to Caernarfon, beginning by travelling from the city of Hull to the North Yorkshire market town of Malton

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo picks up his rail journey from Warwick to Rye. In Reading, he traces the origins of education for workers and in Henley-on-Thames he slips into a launch to hear about the world-famous regatta. Afternoon tea on the bank offers a chance for Michael to hear about four heroes of early 20th-century literary classic The Wind in the Willows

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In picturesque Snowdonia, Michael Portillo braves the fastest zip line in the world - stretching 1,500 feet across a vast slate quarry as he begins the last leg of his journey to Caernarfon. En route, he also visits the home of British mountaineering, Pen y Gwryd, to hear how an Edwardian journalist and poet created a climbing community, which grew to include men who would conquer Everest in the 1950s

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on the final leg of his journey following the route of the North Country Continental service. Along the way he meets volunteers on the Mid-Suffolk Light railway and is permitted to drive The Middy. In Leiston, Michael uncovers the worlds first purpose-built assembly line, while in Ipswich the work of a young Victorian engineering prodigy impresses the ex-politician. At his destination of Harwich the presenter discovers how the port became a gateway to the continent, only to be superseded by a new deep-water port further inland

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Adventurer Simon Reeve sets out to travel around the coastline of the Indian Ocean, journeying by boat, car, train and plane as he takes in 16 countries. He starts on the tip of South Africa, where he dives with ragged-tooth sharks and joins conservationists helping to save the endangered African penguin, before heading into Cape Town, where he has a close encounter with a drug dealer. Moving on, he hitches a boat to Mozambique, where a nervous captain reveals the threat posed by Somali pirates, and completes this leg of his journey in Zanzibar, a tropical island steeped in the long history of the slave trade

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The adventurers epic journey continues on the coast of Madagascar, where he goes spearfishing with the Vezo people, whose lifestyle is under threat from their own rapid population growth. On Mauritius, he visits slums that show a different side to the tourist paradise, and he ends this leg in the Seychelles, meeting an Englishman who is turning his private island into the worlds smallest national park. Simon also joins the Dutch Special Forces, training to board pirate ships operating on the high seas

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The third leg of the adventurers journey takes him from the south of Kenya to the Horn of Africa. Along the way he joins a Ugandan peace-keeping force in Mogadishu, the capital of war-torn Somalia, which turns out to be the most dangerous leg of his journey as he ends up under fire on the front line. In contrast, he finds neighbouring Somaliland a stable and democratic home to thousands of Somalis fleeing fighting and famine. In Kenyas Tana Delta, he meets villagers facing eviction from an area that the government is turning over to sugar cane production for bio-fuels

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The fourth leg of the adventurers journey takes him from Oman to the Maldives. He starts in the Strait of Hormuz, where oil from the Gulf is shipped through the narrow channel, then moves on to Mumbai, the oceans biggest port. In the Maldives, Simon finds arguably the most beautiful collection of tropical coral islands in the world - but the fragile underwater environment is a barometer for the changing nature of the sea, as he witnesses how bleaching has damaged the coral and an entire island has been manufactured as a landfill dump to deal with the problem of rubbish

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve

programme.desc: Barker and Corbett continue their gripping serial Done to Death, together with a classic monologue and a song from Chelsea Brown

programme.desc: Vintage comedy from Messrs Barker and Corbett, with music by Thelma Houston

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo reaches London on his rail journey from Warwick to Rye in East Sussex. In Ealing, he is transformed for the silver screen by expert hair and make-up, before travelling to Fulham, where he heads underground to explore Londons new super sewer. Then, Michael visits the London School of Economics and Political Science in central London, before finally arriving in Kensington

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo falls into line with the University of Glasgows Officer Training Corps, where he joins students for drill. The political pundit then heads west along the Firth of Clyde to Helensburgh, where he discovers a pioneering group of artists known as the Glasgow Boys. The idyllic West Highland Line takes Michael deep into the Highlands to Inveraray and the ancestral home of the Clan Campbell and Dukes of Argyll. Michaels final stop is Connel Ferry, near Oban, where, on the Achnacloich Estate, he discovers a Highland calf whose breed has become an icon of the Highlands

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his early 20th century Bradshaws Guide, Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a trip through Britains industrial heartlands in the footsteps of George V, beginning by travelling from Warrington to Preston

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Belfast to Portrush, he investigates the work of author and Narnia creator CS Lewis and learns how religion influenced Lewiss work. Michael also visits the Royal Portrush Golf Club to find out how Irelands female population dominated the fairways at the time of his guide

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Blackburn, Michael Portillo catches a rare glimpse of Edwardian life on celluloid and marvels at how factory workers and schoolchildren alike were drawn to seek fame on film. Continuing east to Nelson, Michael braves the enemy camp to have a pint of tea with the socialist working classes in Britains last Clarion House

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a journey from the Midlands to Rye in East Sussex. At Cowley, he marvels at an automated state-of-the-art production line that produces 1,000 Minis a day. Michael probes the pre-First World War origins of the Morris Oxford and is delighted to find that cars for export are loaded in Italian Job style on to trains at the factorys own railhead

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: Biopic of Winston Churchill, following the future prime ministers formative years. While working as a journalist, he travels to Africa to report on the Boer Wars, an assignment that leads to his incarceration in a prison camp. He escapes from captivity and returns to England to begin a political career. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Simon Ward, Anthony Hopkins, Anne Bancroft and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: When works of art start disappearing, stolen by a master thief, Father Brown attempts to catch the culprit and save his soul. Comedy drama, starring Alec Guinness, Joan Greenwood and Peter Finch

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: A boy manages to get himself locked in a bank vault. With 63 hours before the device opens, the authorities are left facing a race against time to free the lad before he runs out of air. Thriller, starring Robert Beatty, Betty McDowall, Vincent Winter, Lee Patterson and a young Sean Connery in an early role

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: A knight returning home from fighting in the Wars of the Roses returns home to discover his father has been murdered. A family friend fighting for the other side has been blamed for the crime, but the knight tries to prove his wicked uncle is responsible. Swashbuckling adventure based on Robert Louis Stevensons novel, starring Louis Hayward and Janet Blair

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkins stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: In 1944, a group of American soldiers land in an occupied French hamlet after their plane is destroyed by enemy fire. Their mission is to take out a heavily fortified Nazi radio tower hours before D-Day. However, they stumble across a mysterious Nazi lab where their bloodthirsty enemies are waiting for them. Action thriller from producer JJ Abrams, starring Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell and Mathilde Ollivier

programme.title: I Am Not a Witch
programme.desc: In a rural Zambian village, Shula, a taciturn, serious-looking pre-teen girl, is accused of witchcraft on the shaky basis that strange things have happened since she turned up out of the blue. But when Shula refuses to confirm or deny whether shes a witch, police officer Josephine contacts government official Mr Banda, who agrees to take care of her. Drama, starring Maggie Mulubwa and Nellie Munamonga. In Nyanja, Bemba and Tonga with English subtitles

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Felix and Tony run a tramp steamer together in the West Indies, but their seemingly unshakeable friendship is tossed aside when they both fall in love with the same woman. Tony tries to undermine his rival by exposing his illegal activities, while Felix responds with deadly intent. Romantic drama, starring Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: A foppish royalist nobleman leads a double life as a Roundhead-baiting highwayman. However, after Cromwells final victory at the battle of Worcester, the dashing hero has to smuggle the son of Charles I to safety in France. Swashbuckling adventure, starring George Baker, Sylvia Syms, Marius Goring, John Le Mesurier and Patrick Troughton

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: A woman trapped in a loveless marriage to the future king of England falls for an aristocrat romantically linked to a possessive countess. Period drama, starring Stewart Granger, Joan Greenwood, Francoise Rosay and Flora Robson

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A Second World War naval officer is given the command of an old sailing ship to undertake a very important mission - to transport an Australian agent into enemy waters so he can spy on the Japanese. However, he finds the ship is falling apart at the seams and is manned by a crew that does not know how to sail her. Comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, John Lund, Chips Rafferty and Tom Tully

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: US Army Ranger Briggs is determined to regain his place at Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington. His superior officer agrees to return him to the fold if he can successfully escort a military working dog named Lulu along Americas Pacific Coast to attend the funeral of her handler. Comedy, co-directed by and starring Channing Tatum

programme.title: Dejà Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: A former US government operative battling with an addiction to alcohol is hired as a bodyguard to the nine-year-old daughter of a wealthy businessman in Mexico City. When the girl is abducted, he swears vengeance on those responsible while setting out on a dangerous, revenge-fuelled rescue mission. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Radha Mitchell and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A motorist travelling by night with his girlfriend nearly crashes into a van on the M1, and as it drives off he sees a badly beaten woman tied up in the back. Stopping at a service station, he panics when his girlfriend disappears and becomes convinced the van driver has abducted her as well. Thriller, starring William Ash, Christine Bottomley and Andreas Wisniewski

programme.desc: Part one of two. An explosion destroys Community General Hospital, leaving Steve Sloan facing the daunting task of helping FBI agent Wagner search the rubble for his missing father and the rest of the team. Medical drama, starring Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica is invited to witness the reappearance of a mysterious comet, but instead finds herself conducting another murder investigation. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Sue Thomas: FBEye
programme.desc: Sue tries to prove the innocence of a man jailed for a double murder 20 years earlier, after the daughter of an officer who worked on the original case reveals her father believed the wrong man was convicted. Deanne Bray stars

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Part one of two. The duo team up with experienced FBI agent Jordan Shaw in the hunt for a serial killer with an apparent obsession for Nikki Heat, the character Castle based on Beckett in his best-seller Heat Wave. Aided by some hi-tech gadgetry, Shaw soon finds partial fingerprint matches at the two crime scenes that lead to a man currently on parole for manslaughter. But it seems the suspect made a peculiar deal on the internet with an anonymous source. Guest starring Dana Delany (Body of Proof)

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: Carrie is forced to confront her painful past when Dr Eugene Lustig, a prominent researcher who helped her understand her condition, is found dead - having fallen from a 12-storey building. A recent conflict puts his disgruntled assistant at the top of the suspect list - until he too is killed - and a search of the latest victims apartment uncovers a box of tapes from one of Lustigs studies, some of which include footage of Carrie. A cassette is missing, however, and its significance could be the key to cracking the case

programme.title: Before and After
programme.desc: An American teenager is accused of murdering his girlfriend and goes on the run. When he returns, the details of his version of the story do not add up. However, although his mother wants to uncover the truth, his father will go to any lengths to keep him out of prison - even to the point of destroying evidence. Drama, starring Meryl Streep, Liam Neeson, Edward Furlong, Alfred Molina and John Heard

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg is thrilled to be recruited as a model - but not everything is as it seems with the job. Meanwhile, Brian accompanies Stewie on a road trip adventure when the baby decides he wants to experience life outside of preschool

programme.title: American Dad!

programme.title: Plebs
programme.desc: The boys attempt to infiltrate a local firm of chariot hooligans in order to get some big drinkers into the bar. Comedy set in Ancient Rome, starring Tom Rosenthal and Ryan Sampson

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Paul continues to ignore his sister Nicola, but her dad Rodney decides its time to talk. Val convinces Jack to fight for his marriage to Diane.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Doug decides he wants to stay in the village and asks Pollard for work - despite Hilarys desire for them to go home. Paul refuses to forgive Nicola.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Claire still isnt convinced of Caseys innocence, and tries to catch her out. Steve is upset when Michelle plans to go away without him and Janice gets reacquainted with Roger.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Leannes hopes of owning her own restaurant are seemingly dashed by Carlas refusal to join the venture, while Roy worries Hayley is working too hard.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: With Louisa visiting her mother in Spain to get some perspective on their marriage, Martin knows he needs to try to change for the sake of their relationship, so he endeavours to keep his promise to her to see a therapist. Aunt Ruth arranges an appointment for him with Dr Rachel Timoney, but a lifeboat training exercise causes problems for the doctor. Will he get back in time for his first session? Martin Clunes stars

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Adam is quick to question Dr Weatherills competence when a beach outing ends tragically for a family. Dr Ormerod leaps in to defend her - but ends up revealing his colleagues condition in his haste. Meanwhile, Dr Goodwin struggles to help a pair of teenage parents gain access to their baby. Amy Robbins and Robert Daws star

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A suitcase inexplicably disappears from the wreck of a crashed car - and it is not long before parcels of cash start being delivered to the residents of Aidensfield. As the mystery unravels the police investigations lead to Bernie, who may hold the key to identifying the villages very own Robin Hood. Jason Durr stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: As Christmas comes to Aidensfield, the locals have their very own Scrooge to contend with in the shape of mean-spirited bank manager Gordon Stringer. With farmer Jack Dugdale at his mercy and Greengrass on the prowl for money he is owed, his son Noel becomes fed up of taking the flak for his fathers unpopularity and runs away. Drama, starring Jason Durr, Bill Maynard, Mark Jordon and Tricia Penrose

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Diane returns to the village to a lukewarm reception from Victoria. Kelly warns Carl and Matthew against a rowdy stag party for Jimmy and insists the same of her hen night.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Jack and Diane try to fix their relationship by spending more time together, but their attempts may be futile as Val finds out Diane nearly had an affair with Billy.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Leanne considers returning to escorting to raise money for the restaurant. Fiz regrets playing a trick on Hayley at the factory.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Janice asks Roger to loan Leanne money for the restaurant but hes not so keen after learning about her sordid past. David starts work at the salon and Violet confides in Sean.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: As the residents try to return to normal life following the armistice, a new development stuns them. Meanwhile, Carlisle puts Anna in a difficult position, Bates reels from the news about Vera, and Thomas embarks on a new money-making scheme. Costume drama, starring Iain Glen, Joanne Froggatt, Brendan Coyle and Rob James-Collier

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Al welcomes his first fishing guests, but an uninvited one means that a good review is definitely not guaranteed, while Bert decides to try to rejuvenate trade at the restaurant by joining an online voucher scheme. Morwenna asks Martin for a pay rise, and Louisa has to find a new babysitter to look after James Henry and reluctantly decides to offer Janice a trial. Penhale is excited to receive his new police issue Taser, but Portwenn does not exactly offer him plenty of opportunities to try it out. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Maggies suspicions are aroused by the death of a close friends mother, so she goes straight to the police to report her fears, leading to a cruel dilemma. The district nurses emotional day comes to an end when she announces her decision to leave Aidensfield, prompting the locals to throw a farewell party. Meanwhile, jealousy rears its ugly head when one of Blaketons old flames comes back on the scene and starts taking an interest in Lord Ashfordly. Rural drama, starring Kazia Pelka, Derek Fowlds and Janie Dee

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lives are put on the line as Mike and Jackie receive orders to provide a refuge for a dangerous police informant, and David is left in charge of Greengrasss house while the old rogue is living it up in the Caribbean _ but does not count on an unexpected visitor making himself at home. Drama, starring Fiona Dolman, Jason Durr and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Crime writer Ariadne Oliver (My Familys Zoe Wanamaker) and four known killers are among those who meet Poirot at a bridge evening arranged by wealthy adventurer Shaitana, who sits out the first game - only to be found later stabbed through the heart. As nobody has left or entered the victims apartment during the night, the guests combine their skills to discover which of the party is responsible. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Lesley Manville and Alex Jennings

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Millionaire Gordon Cloades wife is widowed for the second time at the tender age of 23, arousing the suspicions of his impoverished relatives. Fanning the flames of envy and hatred, psychic aunt Kathy Cloade reveals the grieving widows first husband is in fact still alive, and a second death prompts Poirot to delve deeper into the familys dark secrets. David Suchet stars, with Jenny Agutter, Tim Piggot-Smith and Celia Imrie

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Tonys suspicions are aroused by his latest PhD student, a notorious double murderer known as `Mack the Knife", who has been released from prison claiming to have reformed. Three killings take place soon afterwards, all bearing the hallmarks of his crimes of 30 years ago. However, he appears to have a cast-iron alibi - he is disabled with severe arthritis

programme.desc: Jackie prosecutes her mothers friend for negligence in the workplace, and Blaketon expresses his disapproval of Bellamys relationship with Gina in no uncertain terms. Vernon and David turn their talents to the celebrity catering industry - with spectacular results. Rural drama, starring Fiona Dolman, Michelle Holmes and Susan Jameson

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: An aristocrats wealthy, overbearing wife finances a North African archaeological dig to find the skull of John the Baptist. Poirot is in attendance, but when the woman is found stabbed to death, and only her husband, the exuberant Lord Boynton, appears distraught, the detective struggles to identify the killer among the wealth of suspects. Guest starring Tim Curry, Cheryl Campbell, John Hannah, Emma Cunniffe, Mark Gatiss, Angela Pleasence and Beth Goddard, with David Suchet in the title role

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Former nanny Lavinia Seagram is found soaked in blood and it is believed she had turned to drink and drugs to commit suicide. However, Poirot is soon on the scent of troubled heiress Norma Restarick, who had problems of her own - not least confessing to the possibility she has killed someone herself. Guest starring Jemima Rooper, Zoe Wanamaker and Peter Bowles, with David Suchet as the Belgian sleuth

programme.title: Wire in the Blood

programme.desc: Documentary set inside Woodgreen animal charity, following staff who are committed to matching their homeless dogs with prospective owners. Dafne the sausage dog is pining after losing her human soulmate - and is not sold on plucky papillon cross Woodys moves to impress her. programme.desc: Elisa Esposito is a mute singleton who lives above a cinema. Although friends with Giles, a neighbouring artist, she lives a lonely existence. While he has designs on the cafe worker nearby, Elisa cleans up at top-secret government lab, a bus ride away in Baltimore, Maryland. One day in 1962, she makes a life-changing discovery when Elisa finds an amphibious humanoid creature who is being held captive, and they embark on an extraordinary relationship. Guillermo del Toros Oscar and Bafta-winning fantasy, starring Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon, Octavia Spencer and Doug Jones

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A look at the specialist team dedicated to caring for people when they suffer the potentially devastating consequences of a stroke, including 77-year-old Alex. Husband Paul sits nervously at her bedside as they wait to see if the drug she has been given will bring back her speech and movement. Meanwhile, doctors examine 66-year-old Steven, who has been admitted with severe stomach cramps

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Two families come to terms with life-changing events, including the relatives of eight-year-old Junior, who has an open leg fracture and suspected internal bleeding after being knocked off his bike by a car. His mum Bekki reveals how Junior learned to cope with extraordinary setbacks and how she worries about his future because of health problems of her own. Meanwhile, 46-year-old Anthony arrives in AandE after suffering chest pains during a day out at the races. As doctors attempt to get to the bottom of whats causing his dangerously high heart rate, his wife discusses how Anthonys awareness of his mortality was increased by losing his father

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott delight in Devonshire, where cream teas and antique treasures are on the menu. Amid the local ships, the pair dig up some wooden toys, prized pottery and very shiny things to sell. Irita visits an antiques emporium thats so new, it hasnt even opened yet and also gets her hands on something that brings back happy memories of childhood. Raj, meanwhile, heads off to hear the story of one of the great adventurers of the 20th century, as told by the son of the great man himself

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott embrace their inner pirate as they plunder the shops of the Cornish peninsula. Raj makes some big finds in one of the tiniest shops of the trip and pins his hopes on a risky item that may or may not be highly collectable. Irita plumps for a very cheap purchase and finds a painting that reminds her of her childhood and also contains a hidden secret. Along the way theres still time for some sightseeing, kite-flying and, of course, pirate impressions. The pair then head to the final auction to see who will emerge victorious

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Philip Serrell continue seeking items of value, on a tour of East Ayrshire and Dumfries and Galloway. Natasha picks up a silver tea caddy and a first edition Virginia Woolf collection of books. Philip discovers just why collecting ancient musical instruments was a status symbol in the 19th century. He also finds a beautiful watercolour by a local artist, but is distracted by some very tasty looking homemade scones

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Phil Serrell go shopping for items of interest in Northern Ireland. Natasha is dazzled by the sight of a bright pink Majolica lotus pattern tea service and the sounds of the Irish fiddle. She even gets a mini masterclass on how to play this centuries-old instrument of the Emerald Isle. Philip is feeling the pinch and is desperate to find some profit-making antiques. He scoops up an old bowler hat, a pair of early dumbbells and a mid-19th-century worktable that reminds him of his grandmother. The duo later head to their final auction in Wales, where an unexpected bidding frenzy ensues

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Diesel is a hearing dog for his teenage owner, Rayane, who is deaf. This means he does not hear everything. Diesel is trained to listen out for important sounds that Rayane might miss. Diesel is Rayanes ears. Together, they are unstoppable! Rayane is playing the detective in the drama club play, and Diesel is going to be right by his side as his trusty police dog. At the theatre, Diesel helps Rayane and his friend Grace practise for something called a cue - their big moment to go on stage. Diesel must give Rayane a nudge when he hears two rings from a big red telephone. But during the show, someones phone goes off in the audience! Can Diesel save the day and make sure that Rayane takes to the stage at the right time?

programme.title: Five Minutes of Heaven
programme.desc: In Lurgan, Co Armagh, 19-year-old Catholic Jim Griffin is killed by 17-year-old Ulster Volunteer Force member Alistair Little during the Troubles of 1975. Griffins murder is witnessed by his younger brother, Joe, who is left traumatised as a result. Years later, a reconciliation project is set up, bringing Joe Griffin into contact with Little, who has served a 12-year prison sentence. While the justice system might believe Little has paid for his crime, Griffin thinks otherwise, and heads to the rendezvous with murder in mind. Fact-based drama, based on the real-life killing of Jim Griffin, with the modern day encounter serving as a fictional epilogue to the incident. James Nesbitt, Liam Neeson, Anamaria Marinca and Mark Davison star

programme.desc: Part two of two. The hostage crisis takes a turn for the worse when the perpetrator sets fire to the school, killing one of the buildings occupants. Richard Belzer stars

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A prison riot breaks out and two inmates are killed. Richard Belzer stars

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow heads into the wildling camp to try to negotiate a peace with Mance Rayder, but an unexpected arrival changes the situation at the Wall, while Daenerys is forced to make a decision about the dragons in Meereen. Cersei demands that Tywin call off her engagement to Loras Tyrell, Bran learns more about his destiny, and Tyrion receives a visit from Jaime as he awaits his fate. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: The Italian drama series based on Elena Ferrantes novel returns. With Lila on her honeymoon, Elena struggles to handle school and her relationship with Antonio

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky and his assistant are forced to seek refuge with local racketeer Chalky White when Rosetti makes his move in Atlantic City. Lucky Luciano makes a deal he could regret, war veteran Richard Harrow loses his house privileges and Gillian contemplates the future. Drama set during the 1920s, starring Steve Buscemi and Michael Kenneth Williams

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Gyp Rosettis alliance with Mafia don Joe Masseria backs Nucky into a corner and he is forced to cede control of one of his prized assets to Arnold Rothstein. Elsewhere, Lucky Luciano has to take on a new partner to help him smuggle and distribute heroin after being arrested in New York, while Chalky and Al Capone put their enmity on hold to take on Masserias henchmen

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: An FBI agent interviews the squad about Kellermans behaviour. Gritty police drama, starring Richard Belzer

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A newspaper features a story about Kellerman and the other members of the team. Richard Belzer and Reed Diamond star

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The fantasy drama continues as Tyrion strikes a deal, while Jorah and Daario undertake a difficult task as they seek to catch up with Daenerys. Back across the Narrow Sea, Jaime and Cersei try to improve their situation. Starring Peter Dinklage, Iain Glen, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lena Headey

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions agenda in Slavers Bay sees him seeking a new, strange ally. In the North, Brienne goes on a mission, while in Braavos, Arya is given a chance to prove herself. Beyond the Wall, Bran makes progress with his mystical tuition, learning a great deal in the process. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Gwendoline Christie, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead Wright

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case with help from an eyewitness, while Perry pays Maeve a visit and Robbie puts his plan in motion. Later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode, the Roy family come together to attend a wedding in Italy, and Kendall confronts his father and demands to speak with him

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Furio takes a trip to his native Italy to visit his ailing father, while Paulie makes brave attempts to integrate his mother into Green Groves social world. Carmela explores a possible new source of investment and Ralph cannot wait to see Tony - but only so he can show off his new girlfriend Valentina

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: An unexpected event forces Genny to return to his old criminal ways to save his future with Azzurra. Starring Salvatore Esposito. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: As a project takes Genny and Resta to London, Genny is forced to confront demons from his past. Starring Salvatore Esposito. In Italian

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: An old foe returns to the great game, and Arya faces a difficult choice. Meanwhile, Gilly is given a chance to discover whether Lord Randyll Tarly lives up to his formidable reputation as she meets Sams family, and Jaime puts himself at odds with the Faith Militant as he faces off with the High Sparrow. Fantasy drama, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, John Bradley, Hannah Murray and Maisie Williams

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The High Sparrow eyes another target, Jaime confronts a hero, and Olenna Tyrell plans to leave Kings Landing. Meanwhile, Arya makes a plan

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Amy questions Jakes new outlook on life, but Paul tries to persuade her to see her husband as a new man she can accept

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Maritime Inn landlady Pat gets her first full house of the season as Brixhams tourist trade picks up for the summer - but refuses to hire anyone to help her with the extra work. Powerboat instructor Mike Weatherbee tries to enforce the laws of the sea, carpet-cleaner Dave Satchwill prepares to lead the towns popular ghost tour, and lone fisherman Dave Brown reveals his unusual methods

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woos remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: English nobleman Robin of Locksley returns home from fighting in the Crusades, only to discover that his father has been murdered and his lands seized, while the local people are living in fear under the tyrannical rule of the Sheriff of Nottingham. Branded an outlaw for his defiance, Robin and his Moorish travelling companion go into hiding in the forest, where they recruit a group of bandits to fight for justice, protect the downtrodden, and foil the Sheriffs plan to seize the throne while the king is away at war. Medieval action adventure, starring Kevin Costner, Alan Rickman, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Christian Slater and Mike McShane

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving his kids to school, Matt Turner, a Berlin-based American businessman, learns that his vehicle is rigged with explosives. Director Nimrod Antals thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Noma Dumezweni and Jack Champion

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woos remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington

Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Steve Vail is reactivated when an extortionist targets the agency. Director Renny Harlins thriller based on the Noah Boyd novel, starring Aaron Eckhart, Nina Dobrev and Clifton Collins Jr

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Economic unrest ensues after King Leopold cuts off access to the Belgian Congo, so years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back from Victorian England hoping to stabilise matters. However, he soon finds he has been lured into a deadly trap orchestrated by one of Leopolds envoys. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerichs action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges
